SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Thank goodness you're here.
Otherwise, my clothes would have been
sullied by that creature!
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>What luck! <sp:5:0:0>To think I'd get to witness
you heroically venturing about in your
underpants once more!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Watching you defeat those monsters near
Foothill Stable unencumbered by clothing
gave me something to aspire to.
Failed00: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Painful>Ouch... <sp:5:0:0>If you can't win, no one can.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Any monsters that bump into you are
going to have a bad day, aren't they?
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Too slow... It got me.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe there's
really something to "less is more" when
dressing to fight monsters.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>What?! <sp:5:0:0>Huh?!<sp:5:0:0> No way!<sp:5:1:0> You're not saying
that I've got to fight, are you?!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're amazing! But of course, you set
the standard for excellence back when
we were fighting in our underpants!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>It's you!<sp:5:0:0> The one who taught us all about
standing tough in our underpants!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>You saved me. I really can't fight in this
outfit, you know!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Scare>I'm not wearing the right gear for fighting
right now! <sp:5:0:0>Please, help me!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You really are impressive, aren't you?
I've got to admit, I'm jealous.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I could have handled that even in my
old underpants outfit.<sp:5:0:0> But thanks!
